mapper.insert: insert into Improvedtactics_content values( Improvedtactics_seq.nextval, #{champ}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{masteryData}, #{masteryContent}, #{runeData}, #{runeContent}, #{skillBuild}, #{skillContent}, #{itemBuild}, #{itemContent}, 0, 0, 0, #{imageLink}, sysdate )
insert into tactics_content values( tactics_seq.nextval, #{champ}, #{writer}, #{content1}, #{content2}, #{skill}, #{item}, 0, 0, #{imageLink}, sysdate, #{title})
mapper.select: select itembuild, itemcontent from Improvedtactics_content where num=#{num}
select temp.r, temp.* from (select rownum r, tc.* from tactics_content tc order by writedate desc)temp where rownum<=3
select * from tactics_reply1 where parentNum=#{parentNum} order by num desc
select * from tactics_reply2 order by num asc
mapper.update: update improvedtactics_content set champ=#{champ}, writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, masteryData=#{masteryData}, masteryContent=#{masteryContent}, runeData=#{runeData}, runeContent=#{runeContent}, skillBuild=#{skillBuild}, skillContent=#{skillContent}, itemBuild=#{itemBuild}, itemContent=#{itemContent}, writeDate=sysdate where num=#{num}
update tactics_reply1 set content=#{content} where num=#{num}
update tactics_reply2 set content=#{content} where num=#{num}
